reviewText:
I didn't realize that this is just two columns from Guitar World Magazine repackaged in DVD format.  The included PDF Tear Sheet even says Guitar World August 2011 at the bottom of page.  I always enjoy the In Deep articles, and I save my Guitar World back issues.  I assumed that it was an "In Depth" exploration of these topics, beyond the GW monthly column.  I have these exact articles in my personal archives.  I proficient at reading music, and don't need video demonstrations.

I'm disappointed with my purchase, but i'm still giving it 3 stars because Andy Aledort always has some tasty licks.
